title: Issues Switching Region
body: I just got back from a term abroad in Jordan and while I was there I switched my account to EUW.  I did not switch it back before I left and now that I am home I am unable to buy RP to do so.  Any RP purchase from my card gets declined because my card holder thinks somebody is stealing my card and buying things from Europe.  I bought RP from amazon but it says that I cannot use it because I am in the wrong region.  Would it be possible for me to transfer regions, then use my region exclusive RP card to pay for it?  This has been quite frustrating, has anybody else had this experience?

replies.body:
First off, welcome back from your trip! Your situation pops up here on H&S every once in a while and we may be able to help out! We'll need you to put a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in so one of our specialists can take a look at what's happened and what we can potentially do. I can't make any promises, but that's the best course of action right now.

Let me know if you have any questions.
